full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement: W168A-23MK09 Heaters**

**Reference Number:** WS4553008631

**Purchase Order Amendment:** 1
**Solicitation Number:** WS4553008631

**Publication Date:** July 11, 2024
**Closing Date:** August 01, 2024, 2:00 PM EDT

**Contract Period:**

* **Expected Start Date:** September 02, 2024
* **Expected End Date:** April 30, 2025

**Request for Standing Offer:**

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND) invites qualified suppliers to submit a Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) for the provision of labor, materials, tools, equipment, transportation, and supervision necessary for the rental and related servicing and maintenance of portable heaters and associated components.

**Background:**

The RFSO is required for the heating of temporary living quarters during military operations training exercises at 3 CDSB Garrison Wainwright and Edmonton Garrison area, as well as for Civilian emergency situations located around Edmonton and Wainwright (as determined by DND).

**Scope of Work:**

The successful supplier will provide the necessary resources to facilitate the rental and related servicing and maintenance of portable heaters and associated components. The Standing Offer will be for three (3) years, with two (2) one-year option periods.

**Trade Agreements:**

Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement (CHFTA)
Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement (IPECC)
World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement (CAFTA-4)
Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)

**Key Documents:**

- Tender Description
- Request for Standing Offer (RFSO)
- Contract Documents

**Submission Information:**

- Submission Deadline: August 01, 2024
- Submission format: Electronic submission via the BidPost System
- Documents to be submitted: RFSO respondents are required to submit all required documentation and a copy of the completed RFSO.

**Contact Information:**

- Jared Popp
- SPAC/PSPC
